doc:
Alma Beltran https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alma_Beltran 0 Alma Leonor Beltran (August 22, 1919 – June 9, 2007) was a Mexican-American film, stage and television actress. She appeared in 82 films between 1945 and 2002. In addition to her film roles, Beltran played over 80 roles in film and television, often in smaller roles, always as Mexican women, and then later in her career, as matriarch types. She is best known as Mrs. Fuentes, mother of Julio Fuentes, on the NBC-TV series Sanford and Son. Alma_Leonor_Beltran ( August_22_,_1919 – June_9_,_2007 ) was a_Mexican-American_film_,_stage_and_television_actress . She appeared in 82_films between 1945_and_2002 . In addition to her_film_roles , Beltran played over_80_roles in film_and_television , often in smaller_roles , always as Mexican_women , and then_later in her_career , as matriarch_types . She is_best_known as Mrs._Fuentes , mother of Julio_Fuentes , on the_NBC-TV_series_Sanford_and_Son .
